readable.content: A man in a red jacket is standing at the top of some steps at night . A man in a red jacket is standing at the top of the stadium steps . a man in a red shirt at the top of a set of stairs with arena lights on in the background A man stands at the top of a flight of stairs at the entrance to a stadium . A man stands at the top of a stadium staircase .
